level.heading: Federal write-in absentee ballot.
level.text: A covered voter may use a federal write-in absentee ballot to vote for all offices and ballot measures in an election described in § 1-1061.03.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-137
level.text: For history of Law 19-137, see notes under § 1-1061.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 11 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act.
